title: Payment calculator
description: Don't miss this blank-canvas Gramercy bargain, priced for a fast sale! & nbsp; A rare opportunity to update a clean 1BR estate unit, on a sought-after tree-lined block . & nbsp; With Stuyvesant Square at the next corner, it's perfectly situated between the East Village, Gramercy Park and Union Square. The airy H-line one-bedroom apartments make well-proportioned homes featuring a large living/dining area, a king-sized bedroom , and abundant closet space . Updated units in the H line have sold for between $725,000 and $775,000, so 4H is priced to provide the lucky buyer with the option of investing in contemporary upgrades or merely adding fresh appliances to the kitchen for immediate occupancy. Shabby kitchen appliances have been removed; shiny new Friedrich wall-through air conditioners have been installed.   This well-managed and maintained, & nbsp; pet friendly , elevator co-op offers a live-in superintendent , storage, garage, bike room, video intercom and app, fob entry, and updated lobby. & nbsp; Co-purchasing, gifting, pied- & agrave; -terres, and subletting are permitted. Steps away from Trader Joe's, West Side Market, Whole Foods, Union Square Greenmarket and the best transit hub in Manhattan. Enjoy easy access to great gyms, restaurants, shopping, and entertainment. Don't hesitate to schedule your showing - with rents and stocks at all-time highs and mortgage rates easing, now is the time to capture this exceptional value.
